Home / Conference

Conference week overview

Design your experience with a mix of workshops, keynotes, and networking sessions.

Signature experiences

Every day of PNSQC is built around immersive learning, practical takeaways, and opportunities to connect with peers across the quality community.

Hands-on workshops

Facilitated sessions that provide guided practice with tools, frameworks, and techniques.

Keynotes & panels

Industry leaders share strategic insights on quality engineering, testing, and product delivery.

Community forums

Interactive discussions centered on leadership, career growth, and emerging challenges.

Weekly flow

Monday · Multi-hour workshops and deep-dive courses
Tuesday · Tutorials, leadership labs, and small group forums
Wednesday · Opening keynote, sponsor showcase, breakout sessions
Thursday · Conference sessions, panels, and community reception
Friday · Certification prep, practitioner roundtables, and closing keynote

Venue & participation

Join in person in the Seattle metro area or attend virtually with live-streamed sessions and on-demand access. Attendees receive digital proceedings and session recordings.

  • Hybrid access for conference sessions and selected workshops.
  • Networking lounges with sponsor meet-and-greets and community activities.
  • Accessibility-first with captioning, accessible rooms, and dietary options.

Conference add-ons

Customize your experience with leadership forums, certification prep sessions, and hands-on training.
